creator: stemarco@ix.netcom.com
text:
MacOS X creates a file called .DS_Store. This file, and other dot-files should be 
filtered out when loading webapps.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Seems easy to fix, but low priority. AFAIK Apache and other servers do not treat dot files in any special way - if you have it in a dir it'll be served
as such. You can disable the autoloading and load explicitely using the config file if it's important to fine control what's loaded.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: *** Bug 2178 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
